result.ga: An bhfuil urú ar an fhocal
result.orig: An bhfuil urú ar an fhocal
result.html: An bhfuil urú ar an fhocalIs the word eclipted?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil urú ar an ḟocalIs the word eclipted?

result.eng: Read the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ga: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.orig: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.html: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ponchtml: Léiġ an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.

result.ga: Cad is brí leis an fhocal seo
result.orig: Cad is brí leis an fhocal seo
result.html: Cad is brí leis an fhocal seoWhat does this word mean?
result.ponchtml: Cad is brí leis an ḟocal seoWhat does this word mean?

result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ga: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.orig: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.html: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrthaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ponchtml: Cuideoiḋ na habairtí samplaċa leat na focail a ḟí isteaċ i do ċuid cainte go nádúrṫaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.eng: The more words you use the better.
result.ga: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearrThe more words you use the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá liaċt focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearrThe more words you use the better.

result.html: Is leor focal amháinOne word is enough.
result.ponchtml: Is leor focal aṁáinOne word is enough.

result.eng: He is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.
result.ga: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóirí
result.orig: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóirí
result.html: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóiríHe is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.
result.ponchtml: Is státseirḃíseaċ é - i ḃfocail eile tá sé ag maireaċtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóiríHe is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.

result.eng: The sample sentences show how to use the words in context.
result.ga: Léiríonn na habairtí samplacha an dóigh chun na focail a úsáid i gcomhthéacs
result.orig: Léiríonn na habairtí samplacha an dóigh chun na focail a úsáid i gcomhthéacs
result.html: Léiríonn na habairtí samplacha an dóigh chun na focail a úsáid i gcomhthéacsThe sample sentences show how to use the words in context.
result.ponchtml: Léiríonn na habairtí samplaċa an dóiġ ċun na focail a úsáid i gcoṁṫéacsThe sample sentences show how to use the words in context.

result.eng: Number of words in the article.
result.html: Líon na bhfocal san altNumber of words in the article.
result.ponchtml: Líon na ḃfocal san altNumber of words in the article.

result.eng: I didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ga: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.orig: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.html: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫuig mé gaċ focal aċ ṫuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.

result.html: Tá stór focal leathan aigeHe has a wide vocabulary.
result.ponchtml: Tá stór focal leaṫan aigeHe has a wide vocabulary.

result.html: Tá séimhiú ar an fhocalThe word is lenited.
result.ponchtml: Tá séiṁiú ar an ḟocalThe word is lenited.

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: The words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ga: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.orig: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.html: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na focail amaċ as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.

result.html: D'úsáid siad códfhocail eatarthu féinThey used codewords among themselves.
result.ponchtml: D'úsáid siad códḟocail eatarṫu féinThey used codewords among themselves.

result.eng: The horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ga: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.orig: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.html: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibhThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ponchtml: Na huafáis a ċonaiceamar uafáis naċ n-oireann focla dóiḃThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.

result.html: Glac m'fhocalsa airTake my word for it.
result.ponchtml: Glac m'ḟocalsa airTake my word for it.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
